summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 3.3°C) and outside temperature (down 2.2°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 9%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 811 m) and light levels (up 12569 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 14537 lux), cloud levels (up 1508 m), feels like temperature (up 5.3°C), and outside temperature (up 3.8°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 811.2m lower than yesterday, 621.4m lower than the past week, 1507.8m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, cloud levels hit a low of 745m and a high of 3580m, averaging 1175.2m; the past week and month reported somewhat higher averages.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; pleasant, mild temperatures. Also, neither too dry nor too humid. Showers, the sky may alternate between sunny and overcast, and dim or diffuse light conditions. Changeable conditions.
